TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationServiceManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 配置身份验证服务的自定义实现的位置。

span.span: Configures the location of a custom implementation of the authentication service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于 或控件的属性 。The class corresponds to the property of the or control. 已启用 AJAX 的应用程序使用身份验证 Web 服务来登录和注销客户端脚本。The authentication Web service is used by AJAX-enabled applications to log on and log off from client script. 可以使用 提供身份验证 Web 服务的备用实现的路径，而不是使用 ASP.NET 的 AJAX 功能提供的内置 Web 服务。You can use to provide the path of an alternative implementation of the authentication Web service instead of using the built-in Web service that is provided by the AJAX features of ASP.NET. 若要在你的应用程序中使用身份验证服务，你必须在配置文件中启用它。To use the authentication service in your application, you must enable it in the configuration file. 如果使用内置身份验证 Web 服务，则无需在页面上显式声明身份验证服务管理器。If you use the built-in authentication Web service, you do not have to explicitly declare the authentication service manager on the page. 若要创建自己的身份验证服务，必须实现一个具有两个方法的 Web 服务： `Login` 和 `Logout` 。To create your own authentication service, you must implement a Web service that has two methods: `Login` and `Logout`. 此外，这些方法需要内置身份验证 Web 服务的相同签名。In addition, these methods require the same signature of the built-in authentication Web service. 下面的示例演示必须在自定义身份验证 Web 服务类中实现的基本类结构。The following example shows the basic class structure that must be implemented in a custom authentication Web service class. 若要使用自定义身份验证 Web 服务，可以通过在页的元素内包含一个元素，在标记中以声明方式添加服务 `` `` ，如下面的示例中所示。To use a custom authentication Web service, you can add the service declaratively in markup by including an `` element inside the `` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 你还可以通过编程方式将配置 为使用自定义身份验证 Web 服务。You can also programmatically configure to use a custom authentication Web service. 无论身份验证服务的声明性部分是否在页上，如果在配置文件中启用了身份验证服务，则支持 AJAX 的应用程序将在呈现的页中包括 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 变量。Regardless of whether the declarative section for the authentication service is on the page, if the authentication service is enabled in the configuration file, then AJAX-enabled applications will include an ECMAScript (JavaScript) variable in the rendered page. 这允许客户端脚本确定当前用户是否已经过身份验证。This allows client script to determine whether the current user is authenticated.

related.span: ASP.NET AJAX 中的 Web 服务
将 Forms 身份验证用于 ASP.NET AJAX

span.span: Using Forms Authentication with ASP.NET AJAX

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证服务的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the authentication service.

value.span: 自定义身份验证 Web 服务的路径。

span.span: The path of the custom authentication Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 未设置该属性，则返回值为 。If the property is not set, then the return value is . 在这种情况下，ASP.NET 中的 AJAX 功能随后将使用对应于以下内部默认路径的内置身份验证 Web 服务： ~/ScriptServices_AuthenticationService。In this case, the AJAX functionality in ASP.NET will then use the built-in authentication Web service that corresponds to the following internal default path: ~/ScriptServices_AuthenticationService.asmx. 如果将设置 为空值或，则会发生相同的行为 `null` 。The same behavior occurs if you set to an empty value or `null`. 可在 控件或关联控件中指定 。 can be specified in the control or in an associated control. 当在 级别设置时 ，以下注意事项适用：When is set at the level, the following caveats apply: - 如果控件层次结构中有多个代理，则不必 在每个代理实例上设置。If there are multiple proxies in the control hierarchy, does not have to be set on each proxy instance. - 如果 在代理实例上显式设置，则对于在其上显式设置此属性的所有其他代理，此值必须相同。If is explicitly set on a proxy instance, the value must be the same for all other proxies on which this property is explicitly set.

exception.span: 在控件层次结构中设置了多个唯一路径。

span.span: More than one unique path was set in the control hierarchy.
